titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 24) to give the President line-item veto authority in appropriations bills for fiscal years 1994 and 1995.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 24 (presidential line-item veto authority).
